description: Using a pressure cooker helps speed up this beef brisket recipe. In under an hour, you can expect melt-in-your-mouth meat in a rich red wine sauce.
name: Beef Brisket in Red Wine Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Lock on lid and change setting to high pressure. Cook for 30 minutes. Carefully release steam valve and remove lid. Change setting to simmer. Mix cornflour with 1 tbs cold water, add to cooker and stir in to combine. Simmer for 5 minutes or until thick, then serve.
